# UI Journey - Web Design Trends Timeline

> An interactive timeline website showcasing web design trends from the 2000s to 2025

## Project Overview

UI Journey is a timeline-based web application that allows users to visually explore the evolution of web design.

## Main Content

### Design Trends Timeline (2000-2025)

- **2000-2006**: Skeuomorphism Era
- **2010-2013**: Flat Design & Metro UI
- **2014-2016**: Material Design & Gradient Revival
- **2017-2019**: Brutalism / Minimalism / Neumorphism
- **2020-2021**: Glassmorphism & Claymorphism
- **2022-2023**: Dark Mode, Neon Style, 3D & Isometric
- **2024-2025**: Scroll Animation, Y2K Revival, AI Design

## Tech Stack

- React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS 4
- React Query
- React Router
- i18next (Internationalization)

## Features

- Mobile-first design
- Responsive layout
- Accessibility (A11y) focused
- SEO optimized
- Domain-driven architecture

## Site Information

- Type: Educational and reference material
- Target audience: Designers, developers, and web design enthusiasts
- Update frequency: Monthly

## License

Private
